articles.title: Every Minute of Hacker News
articles.description: A dataset of every minute of Hacker News over a period of several months.

articles.title: Hacker News Simulation
articles.description: A simulation of the Hacker News news aggregator, available as a web app to play around with.

articles.title: Social Protocols
articles.contents:
The Goal of the Social Protocols project is collective intelligence. We are working on algorithms that better allocate the attention of online communities in order to drive more intelligent conversations.
Quality News is a Hacker News clone provides additional charts and metrics for each submission. We have chosen Hacker News as a starting point for experimenting with social protocols because of the existing community, open API, and proven ranking algorithm. Our hope is to draw enough users to begin experimenting with methods for improving the quality of stories and discussions on Hacker News.

articles.title: Quality News
articles.description: A Hacker News web frontend with a new and improved ranking algorithm.
